scripts.create-release-pkg: (cd dist && zip -r -9 ame-frontend-release.zip acfrontend.js acts-util-core.js bundle.js emmentaler-26.woff images index.htm site.css)
scripts.deploy-debug: ln -s ../index.htm dist/ && ln -s ../node_modules/acts-util-core/dist/acts-util-core.js dist/ && ln -s ../node_modules/acfrontend/dist/acfrontend.js dist/ && ln -s ../node_modules/acfrontend/dist/clean.css dist/ && ln -s ../emmentaler-26.woff dist/ && ln -s ../images dist/
